des:
The Hombli Skill lets you control your Hombli devices with voice commands. Use your voice to control your smart home hands-free without needing your mobile phone. Just tell Alexa what to do! 

The setup is easy. Simply enable the Hombli Skill in the Alexa App and link your accounts. If you are experiencing any problems with the setup, please visit our guide at www.hombli.com/manual. 

1. Download and install the Hombli app for iOS or Android.
2. Open the Hombli app, and tap the ‘Register’ button or log in with an existing account.
3. Open the Amazon Alexa app on your device.
4. Search for the Hombli Skill.
5. Tap ‘Enable to Use’ to start linking.
6. Log in with your Hombli app account and tap ‘Authorize’ to connect with Amazon Alexa.
7. You can now choose the devices you’d like to voice control with Amazon Alexa.

Below are some examples of voice commands you can use to control your Hombli devices. Note that the device names are examples. The actual device names will depend on your settings. 

Voice-commands to turn your device on/off: 
“Alexa, turn on the living room lights.” 
“Alexa, turn off Hombli Smart Socket.” 

Voice-commands to adjust settings: 
“Alexa, set the bedroom lights to 40%.” 
“Alexa, set the living room lights to red.” 
“Alexa set the kitchen lights to cool white.” 

This Hombli Skill is compatible with any Hombli device that supports Amazon Alexa. Please check the settings of your device in the Hombli app if it's compatible. 

Learn more about connecting Alexa to Hombli at www.hombli.com/manual.
